text: wakadhalika baʿathnahum liyatasaalu baynahum qala qailun min'hum kam labith'tum qalu labith'na yawman aw baʿda yawmin qalu rabbukum aʿlamu bima labith'tum fa-ib'ʿathu ahadakum biwariqikum hadhihi ila l-madinati falyanzur ayyuha azka taʿaman falyatikum biriz'qin min'hu walyatalattaf wala yush'ʿiranna bikum ahadan
